binary.name: istp_text
binary.syntax: istp_text [-cf cfgname] [-h] [-path pathname] [-sd yyyymmdd] [-st hr:mn] [-ed yyyymmdd] [-et hr:mn] [-ex hr:mn [-gse] [-pos] [-mfi] [-swe] [-mag] [-pla] [-mgf] [-lep] [-cpi] [-ace] [-wind] [-imp8] [-geotail]

synopsis.p: Extract ASCII listings of ISTP data from CDF files.

option.od: print the help message and exit.
print the RST version number and exit.
read command line options from the file cfname.
include headers in the text file.
read the data files from the directory path.
extract starting from the date yyyymmdd.
extract starting from the time hr:mn.
stop extracting at the date yyyymmdd.
stop extracting at the time hr:mn.
extract an interval whose extent is hr:mn.
plot in GSE coordinates, not GSM.
include spacecraft position in the text file.
include MFI data.
include SWE data.
include MAG data.
include PLA data.
include MGF data.
include LEP data.
include CPI data.
include ACE data.
include Wind data.
include IMP8 data.
include Geotail data.

description.p: Generates a plain ASCII text file containing ISTP magnetic field and solar wind data from a set of CDF files. The file is written to standard output.
The program usually produces 24 hours of magnetic field data in GSM co-ordinates for a given start date and satellite.
The data files are taken from the sub-directories "ace", "wind", "imp8" and "geotail", of the path given by the "-path" option or by the environment variable ISTP_PATH.

example.description: Generate a text file containing 24 hours of ACE data starting at 00:00UT on April, 6 1999. The output is stored in the file "mfi.txt".
Generate a text file containing 8 hours of Wind MFI, SWE and position data starting at 04:00UT October 14, 1997. The output is stored in the file "19981112.wnd.txt".
Generate a text file containing ACE MFI and Position data, starting at 06:00UT April 6, 1999 and ending at 12:00UT April 8,1999. The output is stored in the file "mfi+pos.txt".
